achat-habitat.subtitle: Welcome to the MOOC Achat Habitat! Sign up for free to start the adventure!
achat-habitat.prevalidation: A MOOC lead by IFCAM, the University of Groupe Crédit Agricole
achat-habitat.branch: Did you know this Mooc via
achat-habitat.newsletter: I wish to subscribe to the MOOC Premier Achat Logement Newsletter
achat-habitat.mandatory:
* required fields

Your personal data are processed by IFCAM for the management of the MOOC First Purchase Housing and the sending of newsletters for educational purposes only. In accordance with French and European regulations on the protection of personal data, you can at any time exercise your right to access, rectify and delete personal data concerning you and to oppose the processing of your personal data. You also have the right to define general or specific guidelines on the fate of your personal data after your death. Only the specific guidelines for the processing of personal data implemented by IFCAM will be registered by IFCAM. To exercise your rights, you can send an e-mail to cnil@ca-ifcam.fr

architas-powercircle.passwordHelp:
Password complexity: 
 - Minimum password length: 8 Characters 
 - Mandatory 3 of the following: 
 	 1/ Uppercase characters of European languages (e.g. A through Z) 
 	 2/ Lowercase characters of European languages ( e.g. a through z) 
 	 3/ Base 10 digits ( 0 through 9)

digitlearning.longTermContract:
With regards to the multiple digital experiences that will be on offer to you, BNP Paribas Asset Management France will be collecting personal information that will help us better understand your needs, as well as the data mentioned in the T&Cs.
As a result, do you authorise BNPP AM to analyse your data and are you willing to consequently be contacted by a Client Relationship Manager who will accompany you in your journey? If you wish to modify your consent, please send your request to:
AM.DIGITLEARNING@bnpparibas.com

nespresso.firstNameHint: Please use your full first name (not your nickname)
nespresso.emailHint: If you are a Nespresso employee, please use your Nespresso email address. This field is case-sensitive
nespresso.passwordHint: Minimum 10 characters long Passwords must contain characters from three of the following five categories: - Uppercase characters of European languages (A through Z, with diacritic marks, Greek and Cyrillic characters) - Lowercase characters of European languages (a through z, sharp-s, with diacritic marks, Greek and Cyrillic characters) - Base 10 digits (0 through 9) - Nonalphanumeric characters: ~!@#$%^&*_-+=`|(){}[]:;“’<>,.?
nespresso.longTermContract:
The undersigned acknowledges that the Nespresso Digital Academy and all of the information contained therein is Nespresso’s confidential information. The undersigned agrees that the Nespresso Digital Academy and all of the information contained therein shall be kept confidential and not disclosed to any third parties.
The undersigned acknowledges that the Nespresso Digital Academy is intended for use during working hours.
